CustomField.formula:
IF ( AND($Permission.CLM_Contract_Manager_Permission, OR( $User.Id = OwnerId, CONTAINS($Label.CLM_Profiles, $Profile.Name)), OR( ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status_Category__c, "Request"), ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status_Category__c, "In Authoring"), ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status_Category__c, "In Signatures"), ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status_Category__c, "In Application"))
), IF(OR($User.UIThemeDisplayed == 'Theme4d', $User.UIThemeDisplayed == 'Theme4t', $User.UIThemeDisplayed == 'Theme4u'), HYPERLINK("/apex/Apttus__LightningOfflineDocumentImport?id="&Id, IMAGE("/resource/Apttus__Button_ImportOfflineDocument", "Import Offline Document"),"_self"), HYPERLINK("/apex/Apttus__OfflineDocumentImport?id="&Id, IMAGE("/resource/Apttus__Button_ImportOfflineDocument", "Import Offline Document"),"_self")), NULL)
CustomField.label: ImportOfflineDocument_Custom
